brief_title: EGFR/B7H3 CAR-T on Lung Cancer and Triple Negative Breast Cancer
diseases: ['EGFR/ B7H3-positive Advanced Lung Cancer', 'EGFR/ B7H3-positive Advanced Triple-negative Breast Cancer']
diseases_list: EGFR/ B7H3-positive Advanced Triple-negative Breast Cancer
brief_summary: This study is a single-arm, open, exploratory clinical study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of EGFR/B7H3 CAR-T in patients with EGFR/ B7H3-positive advanced solid tumors (lung cancer and triple-negative breast cancer)
